description.value:
Once per long rest, through a mental technique passed down through generations of yagudo, you briefly close your eyes and put yourself into a state of self-induced hypnosis. You distance yourself from reality in preparation for the violence of combat. As you open your eyes again, you act purely on instinct, becoming @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.Y822OUCDEPAG0HS8]{Frenzied}. At the end of your turn, you can attempt to make a DC 13 Wisdom (Save) check to end the frenzy.
Frenzied conditions started this way are not affected by the Calm Mind racial trait.
